seed.description: Global seed to use in the simulations

stage_age_evolutions.source: Taken from the maximums in Heuch et al. (2001)

delta_p.description: Weibull power transformation constant for each development stage
delta_p.comment: L0's value is taken from Stien et al. (2005) as beta_2, while the others are taken from Aldrin et al. (2017)

delta_s.description: Weibull shape transformation constant for each development stage

delta_m10.comment: L0's value is taken from Stien et al. (2005) as beta_1, while the others are taken from Aldrin et al. (2017)

lice_development_rates.description: Lice development rates from the ith stage to the next
lice_development_rates.comment: Stien et al. (2005), in turn from Tucker et al. (2002)

background_lice_mortality_rates.description: Background lice mortality rates per stage

reproduction_eggs_first_extruded.description: Initial number of viable eggs after the first extrusion

reproduction_age_dependence.description: Exponential coefficient on viable eggs depending on age

dam_unavailability.description: Female unavailability time after mating (in days)

smolt_mass_params.description: Sigmoid parameters that pilot the average smolt-to-adult average weight development
smolt_mass_params.comment: FAO - http://www.fao.org/fishery/affris/species-profiles/atlantic-salmon/growth/en/ . See figure 5. These constants were manually fitted on the given figure.

gain_per_kg.description: Selling rate for fish kg (in GBP)
gain_per_kg.comment: Source: NASDAQ Salmon Index, last updated 6/08/21, with a corresponding NOK-GBP currency conversion

reservoir_offspring_integration_ratio.description: The ratio of offspring coming being expelled from the external pressure to make available in the reservoir
reservoir_offspring_integration_ratio.comment: Simple model devised by Debby, modified to include a bayesian mutation ratio

reservoir_offspring_average.description: The length of the rolling average to consider in the external pressure calculation

geno_mutation_rate.description: Mutation rate, as in number of individual mutation events that can happen out of the number of offsprings. For example, 1e-5 is one mutation every 10,000 extruded eggs

male_detachment_rate.description: Rate at which an adult male detaches from a dying fish and survives

aggregation_rate_threshold.description: The allowed aggregation rate at any time

effect_delay.description: Delay between application and observation of noticeable effects of the Emamectin Benzoate (in days)

durability_temp_ratio.description: Ratio between durability and current sea temperature (unit: days / °C)

price_per_kg.description: Cost per kg when applying treatment
price_per_kg.comment: For EMB, Values taken from www.sigmaaldrich.com , rescaled to have a 1kg denominator

price_per_applicatrion.description: Cost per application when applying treatment
price_per_applicatrion.comment: TODO: for the thermolicer this is completely baseless

application_period.description: For how long to apply the treatment (in days)

pheno_resistance.description: Lookup table to translate between genotype.

quadratic_fish_mortality_coeffs.description: Fitted quadratic regression coefficients from Overton et al.
quadratic_fish_mortality_coeffs.comment: The values were found by the overton_treatment_mortalities.py script.
